page.title: 20EDUCATION IN SALISBURY
page.content: Children in one part of the city and area go to First Schools, Middle Schools and aged 13, to a Comprehensive School. In the other part of Salisbury there are Primary Schools and after the 11+ selection, children go to single sex Grammar or Secondary Modern Schools. This has been the system for the last 12 years, and has caused and still causes much controversy. CREDITS ST. Edmund's Secondary School. Pages 1,2,3,4,13,18,19 and 20 South Wilts Girl's Grammar School Pages 12,16 and 17 Fisherton Manor Middle School Pages 14 and 15 Avon Middle School Pages 8,9 and 11 ST. Pauls Primary School Pages 5,6,7 and 10
